version_description:
Built for iOS 9 - boomshakalaka!

Pioneer速 AppRadio速 users - you will now longer need to click the alert view to open Stezza from the AppRadio head unit.

Built for iOS 9 - boomshakalaka!

Pioneer速 AppRadio速 users - you will now longer need to click the alert view to open Stezza from the AppRadio head unit.
Minor bug fix.
Minor bug fix.

Fixed a wee little issue with the #nowplaying text affecting AppRadio users.

Sharing to Instagram made easier - the #nowplaying details are copied to the clipboard so you can paste them into your post. Bazinga.

Thanks for using Stezza. If you have any feedback or feature requests, drop a line to support@stezza.co (there is also a 'Give Feedback' button in the left menu).

Fixed a wee little issue with the #nowplaying text affecting AppRadio users.

Sharing to Instagram made easier - the #nowplaying details are copied to the clipboard so you can paste them into your post. Bazinga.

Thanks for using Stezza. If you have any feedback or feature requests, drop a line to support@stezza.co (there is also a 'Give Feedback' button in the left menu).

- New album change animation (the old one could get out of sync)
- Minor bug fixes
- More translations: Japanese, Russian and German

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements

If you are on iOS 11.2, you probably have noticed that the buttons are unresponsive for about 5 seconds when you tap play/skip. This is an issue in the Media Player framework and will be fixed in a future iOS update.

Bug fixes and performance improvements

If you are on iOS 11.2, you probably have noticed that the buttons are unresponsive for about 5 seconds when you tap play/skip. This is an issue in the Media Player framework and will be fixed in a future iOS update.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
This update tweaks the player buttons arrangement on the iPhone X, and also improves the left swipe gestures when navigating the media library and when seeking the track position.
This update tweaks the player buttons arrangement on the iPhone X, and also improves the left swipe gestures when navigating the media library and when seeking the track position.
Support for iOS 12 and iPhone XS and XS Max
Support for iOS 12 and iPhone XS and XS Max
Did you see the purple screen of death? Let me know at support@stezza.co if this fixes it for you.
